Fun game with friends, but the community is terrible. People rarely play fair and if teamed up with stangers they also tend to not be helpful or call you names in the end chat if they think you aren't good enough. Many killers often don't like to play fair and tunnel and camp. I only recommend this game if you have 3 other friends to play with - alone this game is terrible.

I only bought this game to crossplay with my PS4 friend and its a repetitive garbage dump, its pay to win, the survivors are at a major disatvantage making the game extremely broken and difficult, at this point my friends know what to do so its not as frustrating. The gameplay is garbage and repetitive focused around fixing some generators which means holding down left click for 5 minutes while pressing space bar at random intervals. Only buy this game if you lost motor control of eight of your fingers and only need a game which require just two fingers.

Muy entretenido para jugar con amigos, aunque estaria bueno que implementen la opcion de hablar entre supervivientes a una cierta distancia como en el roleplay.

Siempre me ha gustado este juego, esta es mi segunda cuenta después de 1800h de juego, 4 de cada 5 partidas están grifeadas por los jugadores aleatorios, no se puede jugar si no estás en pre-made party.
Killers que solo quieren farmear bp's y los survivors haciendo dc en los primeros 3 mins de partida, por todo lo demás me da pena tener que darle un downvote al juego con lo bueno que es, pero sin embargo creo que warnear de esta conducta de los jugadores es importante. 

Gracias BHVR como siempre, un placer jugar vuestro juego.

Really enjoyable game to dive in and play by yourself or with a group of friends. A vast Killer selection in this game makes it a lot of fun for anyone to find the play style they want to use and same goes for the Survivors selection as well. All around a well-made game and the company takes care of the game as well; with updates pretty consistently and monitoring of the game is done right! Love this game and genuinely can't get enough.
